synopsis.text:
Being an ordinary high school student, our heroine's life takes an unexpected turn when a cataclysmic event obliterates her entire class. In a twist of fate, the students find themselves reincarnated into a fantastical world, reminiscent of a role-playing game. While some are reborn into privileged positions as princes and prodigies, our protagonist is not so fortunate. She finds herself reincarnated as a spider, the weakest of all monsters.

Determined to survive in this unfamiliar and dangerous world, she must navigate through treacherous labyrinths teeming with menacing creatures. Armed with her indomitable spirit and resourcefulness, she learns to adapt to her new arachnid form, using her webs and cunning to outsmart her foes. As she battles to survive, she discovers that this new world operates on a system akin to an RPG, where she can level up and evolve by defeating monsters.

This is the captivating tale of a girl, once an outcast in her human life, who must now endure the trials of her new existence as a spider. Will she manage to overcome the odds and thrive in this perilous world, or will she succumb to its dangers? Join her as she embarks on an epic journey of survival and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
